page.title: 01INTRODUCTION HOLBERROW GREEN
page.content: Holberrow Green is a rural Worcestershire area, sparsely populated, comprising mainly farmland. There are small residential contingents concentrated in the areas known as Holberrow Green, Stockwood, and Bouts. There are a few other family units in the now depleted community of Morton Underhill. The aspects to be covered by these pages fall into the following categories: The LANDSCAPE and land usage which provides a look at BUILDINGS of interest. The POPULATION which will take into account HOME LIFE and RECREATION. Reference will be made mainly to a FARMING way of life. The ECOLOGY of the area including a detailed list of flora and fauna to be found and the work of the Worcs. Nature Conservation Trust. Aspects of TRANSPORT are relevant to this area.
